com.facebook.buck.core.description

Interface RuleDescriptionWithInstanceName<T extends BuildRuleArg>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDescription<T>, Description<T>, RuleDescription<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SkylarkDescription

    public interface RuleDescriptionWithInstanceName<T extends BuildRuleArg>
extends RuleDescription<T>
    An instance RuleDescription that has a more complicated name. The common use case is SkylarkDescription

      • getRuleName

        String getRuleName(T args)
        Returns:
        The user friendly name of a rule. e.g. cxx_binary, or //foo:baz.bzl:some_rule. See DescriptionCache.getRuleType(BaseDescription)
